Records was made possible by a generous grant from the Henry Luce Foundation.New-York Historical SocietyNew-York Historical Society170 Central Park WestNew York, NY 10024(212) 873-3400This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2022-04-29T19:48:35Description is in EnglishDescribing Archives: A Content Standard The documents in the collection are in English
New-York Historical Society
Time Inc. Time Covers
Time, inc.
MS 3009-RG 32
12 Linear feet in 12 record cartons
1923-2015 The Time Inc. Time Covers contains a chronological run of detached covers. Materials in this collection are stored offsite. For more information on making arrangements to consult them, please visit www.nyhistory.org/library/visit.
Preferred Citation Note
This record group should be cited as Time Inc. Time Covers, MS 3009-RG 32, New-York Historical Society.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Gift of Time Inc. in 2015.
Related Archival Materials Note
This finding aid relates to just one record group of the Time Inc. Records. For information about the other record groups and for overall information about the archives, please see the Guide to the Time Inc. Records (MS 3009). The Henry Luce Papers (MS 3014) were acquired with the Time Inc. Records. The collection of books acquired with the records are cataloged as the Time Inc. Reference Library.
Processing Information Note
Melanie Rinehart transferred the collection into new archival containers in 2017. Holly Deakyne processed four additional cartons in 2018. Rinehart and Deakyne created the inventory and other descriptive notes to produce this finding aid.
Use Restrictions
This collection is owned by the New-York Historical Society. Although the N-YHS owns this collection as physical property, the donor specifically retains all copyright and all other proprietary rights which may exist. The copyright law of the United States governs the making of photocopies and protects unpublished materials as well as published materials. Unpublished materials created before January 1, 1978 cannot be quoted in publication without permission of the copyright holder.
Access Restrictions
Open to qualified researchers. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use.
Arrangement Note
Organized chronologically.
Scope and Contents Note
Time Covers contains a collection of covers removed from the rest of the magazine dating from 1923 through July 2015. Later dates sometimes include the entire magazine. This is a collection created by the Time Inc. Library and Archives.
Corporate libraries -- New York (State) -- New York. Corporation records. Corporations -- New York (State) -- New York. Corporations -- History. Library resources Organization files. Publishers and publishing -- New York (State) -- New York. Time, inc. -- Archives. Time, inc. -- History.
